name: Abstraction (bubbles344)
description:
Adapted from my original card game, ABSTRACTION is a fast-paced word game where the faster you guess words with your teammates clues the better.

Access how to play in-game.

This was made using GB Studio, in games controls are displayed as game boy buttons but use keyboard inputs with the following keybindings:

START -  Enter

SELECT - Shift

A - Alt

B - Ctrl

ARROWS - Arrowkeys
